children.name: Verify that VACCINATION PROCEDURE TERM, VACCINE PRODUCT TERM, SITE OF VACCINATION TERM, ROUTE OF VACCINATION TERM fields are mapped to correct instance of coding.display fields in imms delta table

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 201, but got: 403. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': '68fa2a50-3394-4704-8945-a57715fd962c', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'forbidden', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'FORBIDDEN'}]}, 'diagnostics': 'Unauthorized request for vaccine type'}]}
Verify that the Read method of API will be successful and fetch valid imms event detail

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 201, but got: 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
Flu event is created and updated twice and read request fetch the latest version and Etag

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 200, but got: 400. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': 'd400dd02-3d80-41c1-857f-7d6b6aac0b3e', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'invalid', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'INVALID'}]}, 'diagnostics': '-immunization.target must be one or more of the following: ROTAVIRUS, RSV, SHINGLES, 6IN1, MMR, FLU, 3IN1, PERTUSSIS, MENB, HIB, MMRV, BCG, MENACWY, 4IN1, COVID, PNEUMOCOCCAL, HPV, HEPB'}]}
Verify that the POST method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 200, but got: 400. Response: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'id': '2843cc60-62d3-44d2-ac97-8b906f6bfe42', 'meta': {'profile': ['https://simplifier.net/guide/UKCoreDevelopment2/ProfileUKCore-OperationOutcome']}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'invalid', 'details': {'coding': [{'system': 'https://fhir.nhs.uk/Codesystem/http-error-codes', 'code': 'INVALID'}]}, 'diagnostics': '-immunization.target must be one or more of the following: ROTAVIRUS, RSV, SHINGLES, 6IN1, MMR, FLU, 3IN1, PERTUSSIS, MENB, HIB, MMRV, BCG, MENACWY, 4IN1, COVID, PNEUMOCOCCAL, HPV, HEPB'}]}
Verify that the POST method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

AssertionError: 
 Expected status code: 400, but got: 502. Response: {'fault': {'faultstring': 'Unexpected EOF at target', 'detail': {'errorcode': 'messaging.adaptors.http.flow.UnexpectedEOFAtTarget'}}}
Verify that Search API will throw error if both different combination of dates and include is invalid
Verify that Search API will throw error if date to is invalid
Verify that the update request will fail for invalid Etag value
